summary: Comprehensive testing of FITQUEST 130 exercises database feature. All backend API tests pass (100% success rate). Frontend code properly implements exercise display and workout creation with category filtering.
passed_tests: ✅ All exercises have required fields (name, category, muscle_groups, description, instructions, tips, equipment, difficulty)
✅ Exercise distribution by category matches spec: legs=25, back=22, chest=20, arms=20, shoulders=18, core=15, cardio=10
✅ Category filtering works correctly for all 7 categories
✅ All exercises have valid categories (chest, back, legs, shoulders, arms, core, cardio)
✅ All exercises have valid difficulty levels (débutant, intermédiaire, avancé)
✅ Exercise field types are correct (strings, lists)
✅ Single exercise retrieval by ID works
✅ Frontend SportPage.jsx correctly fetches and displays exercises
✅ Frontend category filter implemented with all 7 categories
✅ Login page displays correctly with FITQUEST branding
✅ Google Auth integration redirects to Emergent auth

success_rate.frontend: Code review passed - unable to fully test UI due to Google Auth requirement

context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend exercises API fully tested with 130 exercises. Distribution: legs=25, back=22, chest=20, arms=20, shoulders=18, core=15, cardio=10. Frontend requires Google Auth to test UI - code review shows proper implementation of exercise fetching, category filtering, and workout creation with exercises.
